elemental.client
Class Browser

java.lang.Object
  elemental.client.Browser

public class Browser
extends java.lang.Object

Entry-point for getting the access to browser globals.

Nested Class Summary
static interface Browser.Info
          Provides limited user agent information for the current browser.
